en.evaluationRuleWordPasswordHelp: Avoid using the word "password" or any other variation, e.g. "P455w0rD"
en.evaluationRuleCommonKeyboardHelp: Avoid using common keyboard layout combinations such as "asdf", "qwerty", etc.
en.evaluationRuleRepeatedCharacterHelp: Avoid repeating the same character too much. Add in more variation
en.evaluationRuleShortLengthHelp: Add extra words or characters to lengthen your password
en.evaluationRuleSimpleHelp: Use a combination of upper-case, lower-case, numbers and punctuation characters

fr.evaluationRuleCommonKeyboardHelp: Avoid using common keyboard layout combinations such as "asdf", "qwerty", etc.
fr.evaluationRuleRepeatedCharacterHelp: Avoid repeating the same character too much. Add in more variation
fr.evaluationRuleShortLengthHelp: Add extra words or characters to lengthen your password
fr.evaluationRuleSimpleHelp: Use a combination of upper-case, lower-case, numbers and punctuation characters
